alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 7:30PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Marion and north central Linn Counties through 800 PM PDT... At 728 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Mill City, or 17 miles southwest of Detroit, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mill City, Gates, Snow Peak, Jordan, and Green Peter Reservoir. In Oregon this includes State Highway 22 east of Salem between mile markers 28 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades; South Willamette Valley
